verses.name: Nehemiah 3:1
verses.text: Then Eliashib the high priest rose up with his brethren the priests, and they builded the sheep gate; they sanctified it, and set up the doors of it; even unto the tower of Meah they sanctified it, unto the tower of Hananeel.

verses.name: Nehemiah 3:2
verses.text: And next unto him builded the men of Jericho. And next to them builded Zaccur the son of Imri.

verses.name: Nehemiah 3:3
verses.text: But the fish gate did the sons of Hassenaah build, who also laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
